channel.title: CVE Feed for Juniper Networks -- Junos OS where the BGP add-path feature is enabled with 'send' option or with both 'send' and 'receive' options
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Juniper Networks -- Junos OS where the BGP add-path feature is enabled with 'send' option or with both 'send' and 'receive' options

item.title: CVE-2017-2302|2024-08-05T13:48:05.249Z -- juniper%20networks -- junos%20os%20where%20the%20bgp%20add-path%20feature%20is%20enabled%20with%20%27send%27%20option%20or%20with%20both%20%27send%27%20and%20%27receive%27%20options
item.description: On Juniper Networks products or platforms running Junos OS 12.1X46 prior to 12.1X46-D55, 12.1X47 prior to 12.1X47-D45, 12.3R13 prior to 12.3R13, 12.3X48 prior to 12.3X48-D35, 13.3 prior to 13.3R10, 14.1 prior to 14.1R8, 14.1X53 prior to 14.1X53-D40, 14.1X55 prior to 14.1X55-D35, 14.2 prior to 14.2R6, 15.1 prior to 15.1F2 or 15.1R1, 15.1X49 prior to 15.1X49-D20 where the BGP add-path feature is enabled with 'send' option or with both 'send' and 'receive' options, a network based attacker can cause the Junos OS rpd daemon to crash and restart. Repeated crashes of the rpd daemon can result in an extended denial of service condition.
